title: Andrea Leadsom – 2019 Speech on Women in Parliament
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Andrea Leadsom, the Leader of the House of Commons, on 27 February 2019.
content:
Thank you Vicky [Ford] for inviting me to speak about what is such an incredibly important issue – both for this Parliament and for our society as a whole.
